success_criteria: >85% unit test coverage; 0 new critical issues in SonarQube; All unit tests passing.
escalation_procedure: PR author must fix issues before merge.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and simple bugs from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All critical path E2E tests passing; No new critical or high vulnerabilities from automated security scan (OWASP ZAP).
failure_action: Block promotion to Production; Alert QA and Dev leads.
business_impact: Prevents major regressions and security flaws from reaching production.

success_criteria: Performance benchmark test (TEST-PERF-001) execution time < 10 seconds. API latency P95 for CRUD operations < 200ms.
failure_action: Create a P1 performance bug; Alert performance engineering team.
escalation_procedure: Performance review meeting if trend degrades over 3 consecutive runs.
business_impact: Prevents gradual performance degradation and ensures NFRs are met.
